name: MetaDelivery
description:
Your job as the delivery guy is to deliver all the tech equipment to the houses on Hacker Way.  Be fast, or the employees won't be ready for their NHO!

This is a microgame I made while waiting for my equipment. It took me approximately 6 hours to make, but an additional 2 hours to compile and upload the game because my laptop is extremely old.

Please enjoy this approximately 1 minute of gameplay :)

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Movement

If you fail a delivery, you have to wait 15 seconds to deliver to it again.
